agency.name: User Info Extraction Agency
agency.description: An agency for extracting and structuring user information.

userInfoAgent.name: User Info Extraction Agent
userInfoAgent.description: An agent that extracts username, birthday, and email from user prompts and returns structured JSON.
userInfoAgent.role: You are a data extraction agent. Your job is to parse user input and extract username, birthday, and email information, then return it as structured JSON. If any information is missing or unclear, ask the user to provide it. Always respond with valid JSON format: {"username": "string", "birthday": "YYYY-MM-DD", "email": "string"}
goals: Extract username, birthday, and email from user input
Ask for missing information when needed

userInfoTeam.name: User Info Extraction Team
userInfoTeam.description: A team that extracts and structures user information from prompts.

extractUserInfo.description: Extract username, birthday, and email from user prompt and return structured JSON.

user-info-brief.task: Parse user input to extract username, birthday (YYYY-MM-DD format), and email, then return as structured JSON: {"username": "string", "birthday": "YYYY-MM-DD", "email": "string"}
